name: L.o.o.p
description:
Awaken 39127 and repair your ship. 

Designed for the 2 Minute Horror Jam 2020. 

  • A game by Zach Reckless
  • Visual and Audio Design by Sean M. Casey

A revived project from Zach Reckless. Originally made for the 2 min horror jam, but due to conflicting Uni deadlines, released during a later Uni break.
